5.17.22  3:15 am   when you type a bunch of periods like this ......... do you prefer to hold the button or press it a bunch? because they seem pretty similar time-management wise

      a few months ago i went into the preferences and set my keyrepeat rate to the maximum speed and minimum delay. it turns out there's no downside to this. this was a breakthrough for me

5.16.22  11:54 pm   why does one of the frames in the Big Bang part of hotewig (at 0:48) say "i have nightmares"?

      perhaps that's a phrase that generally characterizes SOME of what may SOMETIMES take place at some points in our universe. that sequence of shots is supposed to depict all the energy in the universe exploding all at once, so i had to take some artistic leaps

5.15.22  6:53 pm   how do you write lyrics 

      musically

5.15.22  12:46 pm   what is your process for writing a full-fledged song after finishing song selection?

      go in order. Sometimes the first item i have does not belong at the beginning, so in that case i have to solve like a weird puzzle to find the beginning. Once i have that, it goes in order. from that point, i try to refresh my mind as good as i can, and then do a real-time play-through of the material, and then when it gets to the end, i listen carefully for lightning to strike and come up with the next section. If i don't get anything, then i refresh again and do a another run through. If i do it several times and still don't get the next part, then i'm considered "stuck". in that case, i might do some discussion about what is going on-- and i try to categorically hone in on what might be the right answer. usually what i really need when i'm stuck is a stronger refresh. the best way to do that is to take some time away from it, but if i don't have time for that, sometimes running cold water on my face can work surprisingly well. and then do the run through, and it feels fresh again, and i'd be more likely to hear the next part

5.15.22  12:00 pm   do your recent videos all take place in a 3d environment and some things just appear flat or edited onto the 3d clips

      every video since 'here comes the sun' (including princess) has been made in a 3D environment, sometimes with lyrics and images parented to the camera. Additionally, there is a final stage where i re-import flat renders into a new 3D environment (with an orthographic camera) and do additional work there

5.15.22  10:12 am   if there are multiverses wouldnt they just be part of the universe

      sure. it's a cat and mouse race with language to try to keep up. there always needs be a word to describe the whole 'world', but the word keeps changing as we become aware of more of the world

5.15.22  8:40 am   I dreamt with a person who was a prophet and didnt know it. To try and get the prophecies to work wonders (she was having a negativity outburst and was doing bad futures with her words) someone asked her what if the world doesnt end, and she started singing if the world doesnt end. And i could see the city rebuild itself in a montage while she sang.

      that makes sense

     at many points (often)

     any timeframes for this?

     frequently, on a regular and ongoing basis, any time

      also from what i understand, the way you create, you base a significant amount of your decisions on something along the lines of feelings rather than conscious and deliberate thoughts, so what  amount of your own videos do/don't you understand

     i'm sure i can come up with a pretty decent explanation for all of them

     i have no idea

5.14.22  3:58 pm   what do i do if i want to make friends but all the people are not interesting to me very much, and they are all too different from me. it's as if they question me

      maybe it's time to write some stageplays

5.14.22  2:10 pm   How do I create a unique beat for my song? I just randomly throw out some sounds until they sound right, which takes a lot of time and it sounds bad.

      it might be time to aquaint yourself with the time grid. Start thinking about the 4 beats in a bar. Start thinking about the 4 smaller ticks within each beat. Think about counting through the bar like "1 e & a 2 e & a 3 e & a 4 e & a". This may bring you some more awareness about what possibilities you are working with. So when you're looking for something unique and different, you'll be able to sort of shop around for different places in time to put things

      i keep everyone at a medium distance
